topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552c91d363687226199a0800#post_552c91d363687226199a0800
Whereas Grave of the Fireflies is all about ripping your soul out, Wolf Children is more a reassuring pat on the shoulder while you witness good writing and animation play out. GotF is about making you feel bad while Wolf Children is about making you feel a number of emotions.
